name: Q Moe Link Up / Q萌连连看
name_original: Q Moe Link Up / Q萌连连看
description:
“Sweet Heart” is an exquisitely made casual FPS galgame featuring bishojos. You can challenge yourself through levels, discipline your girls with a variety of toys, or simply enjoy those excitements! Your girls are waiting for their only master in different styles – office lady, bikini, school uniform and queen style…

Features


Sensational illustrations: 4K Ultra-HD CG animations
Addictive contents: Huge, shaking boobs for absolute excitement
Magnificent vocals: SFX and voicework made by renowned CV

You will get absolutely absorbed in this steamy and exciting game in which all kinds of toys are provided for you to discipline your girls!
